tool.name: Dlib Face Recoginition
tool.description: Train with a set of known faces photos and recognize unknown faces in a video

param.name: input_video
param.label: Input Video
param.help: An input video file for facial recognition

param.name: training_photos
param.label: Training Photos
param.help: A zip file with subdirectories each named after a person containing his/her photos

param.name: reuse_trained
param.label: Reuse Previous Training Results
param.help: A Flag indicating whether or not to reuse previous training results from the same training photos if exist

param.name: tolerance
param.label: Face Match Tolerance
param.help: Tolerance level when matching faces, a lower value means stricter match

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Train face recognition model with a zip file of photos of known faces and run face recognition on a video to identify unknown faces using the trained model.
